meanings.definition: The main circuit board in a computer that connects all the components together.
meanings.sent1: The motherboard is like the brain of a computer, connecting everything together.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to handle the motherboard carefully when installing it in the computer.
meanings.sent3: When the motherboard threw a party, all the components showed up for a good time.
meanings.sent4: The motherboard is the heart of the computer, pumping data to all its parts.
meanings.sent5: Without the motherboard, the computer would be just a collection of parts, unable to function.

meanings.definition: To install a motherboard in a computer.
meanings.sent1: I will motherboard the new computer build this weekend.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to motherboard too quickly, or you might damage the components.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, I like to relax by motherboarding a computer for fun.
meanings.sent4: She motherboards computers with such precision, it's like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The technician will motherboard the system with expertise, ensuring everything works smoothly.
